data.message: important message, yo marshall,there is such thing called a paranoromal equation if you can learn this it will change you rap stlyle to the best on earth,now this trick is very hard to do so,u use 3 words for example magntic,steak,god then you merge all 3 words in your mind use an = symbol punch it throgh and yall get the word power and mercy this is the story of adam and eve,practise untill you get it,hopefully you can tell me how ya went,raptor carter
